name: Seismitoad
description: The Vibration Pokémon. It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: On melee attacks made by this Pokémon, roll a d10 on a hit. On a result of a 10, the target is poisoned.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.
